mapper.insert: insert into review (userID, userNickname, movieCd,movieNm, rate, content,imgUrl) values(#{userID},#{userNickname},#{movieCd},#{movieNm},#{rate},#{content},#{imgUrl})
mapper.select: select userNickname, movieCD, movieNm, rate, content,imgUrl from review where movieCd = #{movieCd}

SELECT m.movieCd, m.movieNm, m.titleEng, m.openDt, m.genre, m.posterUrl, m.prodYear, m.directorNm, m.actorNm, m.company, m.rating, m.vodUrl, m.vodClass, f.state FROM movie m LEFT JOIN favorite f ON m.movieCd = f.movieCd WHERE m.movieCd = #{movieCd} and m.userID = #{userID};
mapper.insert: insert into favorite (movieCd, userID, movieNm, rate,imgUrl, state) values(#{movieCd},#{userID},#{movieNm},#{rate},#{imgUrl},#{state})
mapper.update: update favorite set state = #{state} where userID=#{userID} and movieCd=#{movieCd};
